summary.notes: Batch shows systematic issue with German philosophical terminology being flagged as errors when they are actually valid. Pages 160, 161, and 163 have encoding issues with German characters. Pages 165, 169, 172, 179, 183 are actually clean with minimal errors. Most 'unknown words' are legitimate German/English philosophical terms, not OCR errors.
